request_body: Name of the cafe to be added, must not match previous entries.
Estimated number of seats available in the cafe, can be an interval of numbers (e.g., 30-40)
True if the cafe has toilets, False otherwise
True if the cafe has sockets for customer use, False otherwise
True if the cafe has Wi-Fi access available to customers, False otherwise
True if customers are allowed to make audio/video calls, False otherwise
The price for a plain coffee beverage, must be a non-negative number
Google Maps URL for the cafe
An URL containing a photo of the cafe

description: Update a cafe's coffee price by its id.
